amendment.description: To designate Israel as a program country under the Visa Waiver Program if Israel complies with the generally applicable requirements.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3933 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3933 proposed by Senator Pryor for Senator Boxer.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3933 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
